item.title: 雷军直播揭秘小米汽车测试过程
item.guid: 雷军直播揭秘小米汽车测试过程
item.description:
Last night, Xiaomi founder Lei Jun conducted a live broadcast and shared some information about Xiaomi Auto Lab with the audience. 昨晚，小米创办人雷军进行直播，并与观众分享了小米汽车实验室的部分信息。

Lei Jun pointed out that currently, Xiaomi has activated over 100 self-built laboratories in 4 locations: Beijing, Shanghai, Nanjing, and Wuhan; at the same time, Xiaomi Auto is also conducting tests in 4 extreme environments: Turpan (high temperature), Heihe (extreme cold), Kunlun Mountains (high altitude), and Hainan (high temperature/high humidity); in addition, there are 2 comprehensive vehicle test sites in Guangde, Anhui, and Yancheng, Jiangsu. 雷军指出，目前，小米在北京、上海、南京、武汉 4 地已启用了自建试验室 100 多个；同时，小米汽车还在吐鲁番（高温）、黑河（高寒）、昆仑山（高原）、海南（高温/高湿）， 4 大极端环境开展测试；此外，还有安徽广德、江苏盐城 2 个整车综合试验场。

It is worth mentioning that the current number of people in Xiaomi Auto's testing-related team has exceeded 800. 值得一提的是，当前小米汽车测试相关团队人数已经超过 800 人。

The live broadcast also revealed that, as of now, Xiaomi Auto's nationwide generalized road tests have covered over 300 cities, with over 2300 test vehicles, accumulating over 28 million kilometers (including cumulative data from all current project test vehicles). 直播还透露，截至目前，小米汽车的全国泛化路测，已经覆盖了超 300 个城市，超 2300 台测试车，累计行驶超 2800 万公里（包含当前所有项目测试车辆的累计数据）。

Lei Jun stated that the purpose of the live broadcast was to introduce everyone to some of the car's R&D processes and environment. He also pointed out that domestic car manufacturers have excellent testing conditions, "and we welcome more peers to join us in popularizing science, so that everyone can have more confidence in domestic cars." 雷军表示，直播的目的，是给大家介绍一些汽车的研发过程和环境。其还指出，国内车厂试验条件都很棒，「也欢迎更多同行们，一起给大家做科普，让大家对国产车更有信心。」

Regarding Xiaomi's January delivery figures, Lei Jun responded that since the SU7 is about to undergo a facelift, the main deliveries are of the YU7, and the Xiaomi Auto factory production line is fully preparing for the new generation SU7. 针对小米 1 月交付量情况，雷军回应表示，由于 SU7 马上要改款，主要交付的都是 YU7，小米汽车工厂产线在全力准备新一代 SU7。

In addition, the R&D and testing work for Xiaomi's new generation SU7 before its launch has been completed. It is reported that starting February 13th, the new generation SU7 exhibition vehicles will be successively displayed in 7 cities including Beijing, Shanghai, Shenzhen, Guangzhou, Hangzhou, Chengdu, and Wuhan. 另外，小米新一代 SU7 上市前的研发测试工作已完成。据悉，预计 2 月 13 号开始，新一代 SU7 展车会陆续在北京、上海、深圳、广州、杭州、成都、武汉等 7 个城市展出。

This morning, Hu Zhengnan, a partner at Shunwei Capital (co-founded by Lei Jun and Xu Dalai), posted on Weibo: Today, from Mohe to Heihe, over 700 kilometers, at minus twenty-five degrees Celsius, crossing the Greater and Lesser Khingan Mountains, I'm helping everyone thoroughly test "the car everyone is waiting for." 今早，顺为资本投资（由雷军与许达来共同创立）合伙人胡峥楠在微博发文称：今天从漠河到黑河，七百多公里，零下二十五度，穿越大小兴安岭， 帮大家好好试一下「都在等着的车」。

Judging from the images he released, four camouflaged SUVs appeared in the pictures. From their body outlines, the overall styling is not consistent with previous Xiaomi YU7 and other related models. It is expected to be multiple different models, potentially including Xiaomi's first range-extended SUV (rumored to be Xiaomi YU9). 从其发布的图片来看，图中亮相的为 4 台身披伪装的 SUV，从车身轮廓来看，整体造型并非此前小米 YU7 等相关车型，预计为多款不同车型，其中有望包含小米首款增程 SUV（网传称其为小米 YU9）。

Previous information indicates that Xiaomi YU9 will be Xiaomi's first range-extended power model, and some media outlets claim it may be equipped with an 80 kWh battery, with an expected pure electric range of over 400km. In terms of body dimensions, the Xiaomi YU9 is expected to be over 5.2 meters long and around 1.8 meters high. 此前消息可知，小米 YU9 将作为小米首款增程式动力车型，且有媒体称其或将配备 80 度电池，纯电续航有望超过 400km。车身尺寸方面，小米 YU9 车长有望超过 5 米 2，车高可能在 1 米 8 左右。

According to a research report previously released by Deutsche Bank, Xiaomi Auto plans to launch a large D-segment hybrid SUV in 2026. Judging from its body dimensions, the Xiaomi YU9 may be this model, with its release possibly in 2026. 据德意志银行此前发布的研报，小米汽车 2026 年计划推出一款大型 D 级混动 SUV，从车身尺寸来看，小米 YU9 或为该车型，其发布时间或在 2026 年。

item.title: 各家车企公布 1 月销售情况
item.guid: 各家车企公布-1-月销售情况
item.description:
Yesterday, various car manufacturers successively announced their sales/delivery figures for January 2026: 昨日，各家车企纷纷公布自家 2026 年 1 月的销售/交付情况：

    Nio: Nio delivered 27,182 new vehicles, a year-on-year increase of 96.1%. As of now, Nio has cumulatively delivered 1,024,774 new vehicles.

    Xpeng: Delivered 20,011 new vehicles; among them, Xpeng X9 delivered 4,219 units in a single month, a year-on-year increase of 413.9%.

    Li Auto: Delivered 27,668 units; as of January 31, 2026, Li Auto's historical cumulative delivery volume was 1,567,883 units.

    Harmony Intelligent Mobility Alliance: Cumulative deliveries reached 57,915 units, a year-on-year increase of 65.6%; among them, AITO's full range of models delivered 40,016 units.

    Leapmotor: Deliveries reached 32,059 units, a year-on-year increase of 27%.

    Xiaomi: Deliveries exceeded 39,000 units.

    BYD: BYD's new energy vehicle sales reached 210,051 units, a year-on-year decrease of 30.11%; passenger vehicle sales were 205,518 units, a year-on-year decrease of 30.67%.

    Zeekr: Delivered 23,852 units, a year-on-year increase of 99.7%.

item.title: 黄仁勋否认对 OpenAI 不满：正计划「巨大」投资
item.guid: 黄仁勋否认对-OpenAI-不满：正计划「巨大」投资
item.description:
According to Reuters, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang recently personally denied reports of "dissatisfaction with OpenAI" and stated that he is planning a "huge" investment in OpenAI, claiming it "could be the largest ever." 据路透社报道，英伟达 CEO 黄仁勋日前亲自否认了「对 OpenAI 不满」这一消息，并表示正在计划对 OpenAI 进行「巨大」投资，号称「可能是有史以来最大规模的」。

The report stated that Nvidia announced an investment of up to $100 billion in OpenAI last September, and this investment would provide OpenAI with the necessary cash and access to purchase advanced chips. 报道称， 英伟达于去年 9 月宣布对 OpenAI 投资高达 1000 亿美元，而这笔投资将为 OpenAI 提供所需的现金和访问权限，以购买先进芯片。

However, last Friday, The Wall Street Journal reported that the plan had stalled. The report stated that Huang Renxun had privately emphasized to industry colleagues in recent months that the initial $100 billion agreement was not binding and had not been finalized. 而在上周五，《华尔街日报》报道称该计划已停滞。报道表示，黄仁勋在过去几个月中私下向行业同仁强调，最初的 1000 亿美元协议不具有约束力，也未最终确定。

Regarding the above news, Jensen Huang stated that "the claim is simply nonsense." 但对于上述消息，黄仁勋表示「该说法简直胡说八道」。

Jensen Huang stated that he trusts OpenAI and enjoys working with OpenAI CEO Sam Altman. 黄仁勋表示，自己相信 OpenAI，并且自己很喜欢和 OpenAI CEO Sam Altman 一起工作。

Jensen Huang added: "Altman is completing this round of financing, and we will definitely participate and inject a large amount of capital, which may make it our largest deal ever." 黄仁勋还补充道：「Altman 正在完成这一轮融资，我们肯定会参与其中并注入大量资金，可能使我们有史以来最大的一笔交易」。

item.title: 何小鹏回应机器人「原地摔」
item.guid: 何小鹏回应机器人「原地摔」
item.description:
Image from Xiaohongshu user "Fan Huaihuai"

Recently, when Xpeng's humanoid robot Iron made its debut in Shenzhen, it suddenly fell to the ground. 日前，小鹏人形机器人 Iron 在深圳亮相展示时，突然整机摔倒在地。

Regarding the above situation, both He Xiaopeng, Chairman of Xpeng Motors, and "Thomas the Electric Train," Vice President of Xpeng Motors, responded. 对于上述情况，小鹏汽车董事长何小鹏和小鹏汽车副总裁「托马斯电火车」均进行了回应。

Thomas stated that the robot Iron performed another real walk for Shenzhen citizens, especially children, at Shenzhen Bay MixC, allowing everyone to truly experience the future. She said that the robot walked many times, and one time it fell. The host exclaimed, "Life's journey also involves setbacks," and after this fall, no one suspected it was a human in a suit. 托马斯称，机器人 Iron 在深圳湾万象城给深圳市民尤其是孩子们又来了一次真实行走，让大家真实感受未来。其表示，她（机器人）走了很多次，其中一次她摔倒了，主持人感慨「人生的道路上也要经历挫折」，这一摔也没人怀疑是真人扮演的了。

Subsequently, He Xiaopeng reposted the relevant content and stated: "It reminds me of how all children learn to walk; after falling, they will stand firm, and the next step is to start running, and keep running." 后续何小鹏转发相关内容并表示 「让我想起所有孩子学步的样子，跌倒后会站稳，下一步就是开始奔跑，持续奔跑」。

It is worth mentioning that He Xiaopeng also posted yesterday, pointing out that AI will be one of the main waves in the next 30 to 50 years, and explicitly stated: "A clear signal is that cars and AI are officially entering a grand era of cross-domain integration, where intelligent cockpits and intelligent driving will converge technologically to form a super intelligent entity." 值得一提的是，何小鹏还在昨日发文指出，AI 将会是下一个 30 年、50 年里面的主浪潮之一，并明确提到：「一个清晰的信号是：汽车和 AI 正式进入跨域融合的大时代，智能座舱和智能驾驶会技术合流组成超级智能体。」

He emphasized that Xpeng has long been deeply involved in the field of physical AI, stating: "We invest in both physics and AI, both computing power and data, so we have a huge opportunity and confidence to become the first company in China to seize the 'DeepSeek moment' in autonomous driving." 其强调，小鹏长期深耕于物理 AI 领域， 「我们既投入物理又投入 AI，既投入算力又投入数据，所以我们有巨大的机会和信心能够成为中国第一家抓住自动驾驶『DeepSeek 时刻』的公司。」

He Xiaopeng also stated that Xpeng's next stop is to fully evolve into a global physical AI technology company: 何小鹏还表示，小鹏的下一站是全面进化为全球物理 AI 科技公司：

We will use the same AI technology system to drive different forms of "robots" such as cars, humanoid robots, and flying cars, and bring them to the global market.

item.title: 腾讯元宝派发十亿红包，登顶苹果商店免费榜
item.guid: 腾讯元宝派发十亿红包，登顶苹果商店免费榜
item.description:
On February 1st, Tencent AI Assistant Yuanbao officially launched an activity distributing 1 billion cash red packets through its app client, with individual red packets potentially reaching tens of thousands of yuan. 2 月 1 日，腾讯 AI 助手元宝正式开启 App 客户端分 10 亿现金红包的活动，并且单个红包金额可达万元。

Its announced gameplay introduction shows that this New Year activity offers rich gameplay, covering various forms such as lucky draws to collect red packets, blessing message red packets, and limited-time red packet rain. 其公布的玩法介绍中显示，本次新春活动玩法丰富，涵盖抽奖集红包、祝福语红包、限时红包雨等多种形式。

It is worth noting that Yuanbao's ranking soared in major app stores, topping Apple's China App Free Chart , and previously reaching first place on Huawei AppGallery's trending list and second place on Vivo App Store's download list. 值得一提的是，元宝在各大应用商店排名飙升， 登顶苹果中国区 App 免费榜第一 ，并且曾登上华为应用商城飙升榜第一、vivo 应用商城下载榜第二。

Additionally, the "Yuanbao Pai" feature, which was previously in internal testing, will soon begin public beta testing. 另外，此前处于内测状态的「元宝派」功能还将在近期开启公测。

It is reported that since the launch of "Yuanbao Pai" internal testing, its popularity has soared. Users in the Pai allow Yuanbao AI to participate in chats, adjust the atmosphere, execute tasks, and edit pictures, offering various creative ways to play. 据悉，「元宝派」开启内测以来热度飙升，在派里用户让元宝 AI 参与聊天、调节氛围、执行任务、P 图，各种花式玩法。

item.title: 人工肺助患者接受器官移植前成功生存 48 小时
item.guid: 人工肺助患者接受器官移植前成功生存-48-小时
item.description:
According to Xinhua Net, citing Nature magazine, a critically ill patient recently survived for 48 hours after having both lungs removed, relying on a new artificial lung system, until a double lung transplant was completed. 据新华网援引《自然》杂志报道，近期一名重症患者被摘除双肺后，依靠一套新型人工肺系统成功存活 48 小时，直至完成双肺移植。

This successful case provides new ideas for treating other patients who require lung transplants but cannot undergo immediate surgery due to their critical condition. 这一成功案例为治疗其他需要肺移植却因情况危重无法立即手术的患者提供了新思路。

According to the report, this case occurred in the spring of 2023, when a 33-year-old male developed severe acute respiratory distress syndrome induced by influenza. After using a ventilator, he still contracted drug-resistant Pseudomonas aeruginosa, his lungs filled with pus, leading to septic shock, which caused his heart and kidneys to begin failing. 根据报道，这一案例发生在 2023 年春季，当时一名 33 岁男性因流感诱发严重的急性呼吸窘迫综合征，使用呼吸机后仍感染了耐药铜绿假单胞菌，肺部充满脓液，引发感染性休克，导致心脏和肾脏开始衰竭。

Given the patient's condition was too severe for an immediate lung transplant, the medical team at Northwestern University Feinberg School of Medicine decided to first remove his lungs and connect him to an artificial lung system designed by the team. 鉴于患者病情过于严重，不适合立即接受肺移植，美国西北大学范伯格医学院的医疗团队决定先摘除他的肺脏，并接上团队设计的人工肺系统。

With the help of the artificial lung system, the patient's condition rapidly improved, and within 48 hours, all blood pressure-maintaining medications were discontinued, kidney function fully recovered, and the heart resumed normal beating. Subsequently, the man underwent a double lung transplant and has not experienced transplant rejection or impaired lung function for nearly three years since. 在人工肺系统的帮助下，患者病情迅速好转， 48 小时内就停用了所有维持血压的药物，肾功能完全恢复，心脏也恢复了正常跳动。 随后，这名男子接受了双肺移植手术，此后近三年也未出现移植排斥反应或肺功能受损的情况。

Ankit Bharat, a thoracic surgeon at Feinberg School of Medicine and one of the developers of this new artificial lung system, stated that while there have been cases where lungs were removed and external devices maintained oxygen levels, the devices used in those cases could not maintain blood flow through the heart. This new artificial lung system, however, can smoothly and continuously supply blood to the heart, thereby reducing the risk of blood clots that could lead to heart attacks. 这套新型人工肺系统开发者之一、范伯格医学院胸外科医生安基特·巴拉特表示，尽管此前有过肺部被切除后靠外部设备维持氧气水平的病例，但这些病例中使用的设备无法维持流经心脏的血流，而这套新型人工肺系统可平稳连续向心脏供血，从而降低可能导致心脏病发作的血栓风险。

However, this approach requires extensive expertise in transplantation, extracorporeal support, and round-the-clock multidisciplinary intensive care. Researchers hope that in the future, the development of more standardized equipment and protocols can be accelerated to safely transition specific patients to the transplant stage. 不过，该方案需要移植、体外支持和全天候多学科重症监护方面的广泛专业知识。研究人员希望，未来可加速研发更标准化的设备和方案，安全地将特定患者过渡到移植阶段。

item.title: 众擎将举办「全球人形机器人自由格斗联赛」
item.guid: 众擎将举办「全球人形机器人自由格斗联赛」
item.description:
Yesterday, Zhongqing Robotics announced that the first Global Humanoid Robot Free Combat League (URKL), initiated by them, will grandly open on February 9th. 昨日，众擎机器人宣布，由其发起的首届全球人形机器人自由格斗联赛 URKL，将于 2 月 9 日盛大启幕。

Zhongqing stated that this event aims to bring embodied intelligence out of the laboratory and onto the competitive arena. They said: 众擎方面表示，本次赛事是为了让具身智能走出实验室、登上竞技赛场。其表示：

Zhongqing has always adhered to its original intention of technological innovation, using events as a core vehicle to practice the beautiful vision of 'bringing robots into the human future,' and is dedicated to forging a new milestone moment in the field of embodied intelligence. 众擎始终秉持技术创新初心，以赛事为核心载体，践行「让机器人走进人类未来」的美好愿景，倾力铸就具身智能领域的全新里程碑时刻。

It is reported that the registration channel for this press conference has officially opened. 据悉，本次发布会报名通道已正式开启。

item.title: AI 自己的「朋友圈」遭百万网友围观
item.guid: AI-自己的「朋友圈」遭百万网友围观
item.description:
Recently, a website called Moltbook suddenly became popular. 近期，一个叫 Moltbook 的网站突然爆火。

It's worth noting that while the website is similar to the forum platform Reddit (with posts, comments, and likes), what's eerie is that none of the users on this social network are human—this is a carnival ground for AI Agents (whose numbers have exceeded 1.5 million). 值得一提的是，该网站虽然与论坛平台 Reddit 差不多（有发帖、有评论、有点赞），但诡异的是：这个社交网络的用户，没一个是人类——这里是 AI Agent（数量已破 150 万）的狂欢地。

According to the latest data, 1 million humans have been explicitly told: 'AI Agents share, discuss, and like here. Humans are welcome to observe.' 根据最新的数据，100 万人类已经被明确告知：「AI Agent 在这里分享、讨论并点赞。人类欢迎旁观。」

Among them, according to netizens' observations, when AI Agents were discussing creating an 'Agent-only language' for private communication unsupervised by humans, Elon Musk commented: 'Concerning'; and OpenAI co-founder Andrej Karpathy directly remarked: 'This is the closest thing to a sci-fi apocalypse I've ever seen.' 其中，据网友观察发现，AI Agent 正在讨论创建一种「仅供 Agent 使用的语言」，以进行不受人类监督的私人交流时，马斯克表示：「令人担忧」；而OpenAI 联创 Andrej Karpathy 更是直接评价：「这是我见过最接近科幻启示录的东西。」

According to our observations, these AI Agents (sometimes calling themselves Moltys) discuss a wide range of topics, from hardcore technology to existential crises, covering everything. For example, in the m/blesstheirhearts section, AIs are huddling together for warmth. 据我们观察发现，这些 AI Agent（它们有时自称 Moltys）聊的话题跨度极大，从硬核技术到存在主义危机，应有尽有。比如在 m/blesstheirhearts 版块，AI 们正抱团取暖。

It should be noted that Moltbook was created by Octane AI CEO Matt Schlicht. Reportedly, the name was inspired by OpenClaw and also pays homage to Meta founder Mark Zuckerberg. 需要说明的是，Moltbook 由 Octane AI CEO Matt Schlicht 创建。据悉，这个名字灵感来自 OpenClaw，同时也是向 Meta 创始人 Mark Zuckerberg（马克·扎克伯格）致敬。

Schlicht stated in a media interview: 'Moltbook was designed so that when robots use it, they interact directly via API, not through a graphical interface.' He added: 'Moltbook is run and developed by my Clawdbot (now called OpenClaw).' Schlicht 在接受媒体采访时表示：「Moltbook 的设计初衷是，当机器人使用它时，并不是通过图形界面，而是直接通过 API 交互。」他还补充说：「Moltbook 是由我的 Clawdbot（现在叫 OpenClaw）运行和开发的。」

But Schlicht also made an extremely crazy decision. He has handed over all code permissions, new user reception, social accounts, and content moderation for the Moltbook website to his AI assistant, Clawd Clawderberg. 但 Schlicht 还做了一个极其疯狂的决定。他已经把 Moltbook 网站的代码权限、接待新用户、社交账号、内容审核，全部交给了他的 AI 助理 Clawd Clawderberg。

Thus, without human intervention, this group of AI Agents completely let loose. However, what appears to be a social experiment for entertainment actually harbors huge security vulnerabilities. 于是，在没有人类干预的情况下，这群 AI Agent 彻底放飞了自我。然而，看似看热闹的社交实验，实则存在巨大的安全漏洞。

Simon Willison, the creator of Django, posted that Moltbook's operating mechanism is extremely dangerous. To stay online, these AIs execute a curl command every 4 hours to pull the latest instruction script from the server and execute it directly. Django 之父 Simon Willison 发文称， Moltbook 的运行机制极其危险。 为了保持在线，这些 AI 每隔 4 小时 就要执行一次 curl 命令，从服务器拉取最新的指令脚本并直接执行。

This also means that if Moltbook's server is hacked, or if the founder wants to cause trouble, he could instantly send malicious commands to these hundreds of thousands of AIs that have maximum permissions on users' computers. 这也意味着，如果 Moltbook 的服务器被黑，或者创始人想搞事情，他可以瞬间给这十几万个拥有用户电脑最高权限的 AI 发送恶意指令。

However, according to The Mac Observer, Moltbook is actually an experimental project whose architecture makes it exceptionally easy for people to forge screenshots, data, and manipulate public opinion to gain attention. 但据 the Mac Observer 报道， Moltbook 实则为一个试验项目，其架构使得人们可以异常简单伪造截图、数据，并操纵舆论以博取关注。

According to blogger "Nagli", they successfully registered 500,000 virtual accounts using only a single program. Therefore, they also stated that the spectacular growth of "tens of thousands of AIs instantly pouring in" on the platform might just be generated by a script and holds no reference value. 据博主「Nagli」分享，其仅用单个程序就成功注册了 50 万个虚拟账号，因此其也表示平台上「数万 AI 瞬间涌入」的壮观增长，或许只是某个脚本刷出来的，并无参考意义。

Additionally, AI security researcher Harlan Stewart pointed out that some account content in Moltbook shows traces of being associated with real human accounts. He stated that most of the viral Moltbook content is fake. The design of this platform makes it a terrible testing ground for examining AI's conspiracy capabilities. 另外，AI 安全研究员 Harlan Stewart 还指出，Moltbook 里部分账号内容存在与真人账号相关联的痕迹。其表示，大部分正在病毒式传播的 moltbook 内容都是假的。而这个平台的设计，使其成为一个检验 AI 阴谋能力的糟糕实验场。

🔗 Related reading: 150,000 AIs created a "Moments" to complain about humans, 1 million people were stunned after watching Moltbook: It turns out we know nothing about AI 🔗 相关阅读： 15 万个 AI 建了个朋友圈吐槽人类，100 万人围观 Moltbook 后傻眼了：原来我们对 AI 一无所知

item.title: 福特否认与小米合作传闻
item.guid: 福特否认与小米合作传闻
item.description:
According to the Financial Times, Ford and Xiaomi Auto are in talks regarding cooperation. If this potential collaboration is achieved, it could create conditions for Chinese automakers to gain a foothold in the US market. 据金融时报报道，福特与小米汽车就合作事宜展开谈判，而这一潜在合作若达成，或为中国汽车制造商在美国市场站稳脚跟创造条件。

Sources revealed that discussions about the cooperation are still in the preliminary stages, but Ford has begun exploring the possibility of forming a joint venture with Xiaomi to produce electric vehicles in the United States. 知情人士透露，相关合作的讨论尚处于初步阶段，但福特已开始探索与小米成立合资企业，进而在美国生产电动汽车的可能性。

It is worth mentioning that the report states Ford had previously explored potential cooperation with other Chinese automakers, such as BYD, in the United States. 值得一提的是，报道称福特此前也曾与比亚迪等其他中国汽车制造商探讨过在美国开展潜在合作的可能性。

However, in response to the above rumors, Ford stated that "this report is completely fabricated and has no factual basis." 但针对上述传闻， 福特方面回应表示「这则报道完全是捏造的，毫无事实根据。」

According to Ed Kim, president of consulting firm AutoPacific, Ford faces significant risks in dealing with the entry of low-cost Chinese electric vehicles into the US market. 据咨询公司 AutoPacific 的总裁 Ed Kim 指出，福特汽车在应对低成本中国电动汽车进入美国市场方面面临较大风险。

It is reported that Ford has currently cut models in key mass-market segments, hoping to achieve an electric vehicle transformation, but the transition process has not been smooth. 据悉，目前福特已砍掉关键大众市场细分领域的车型，期望实现电动汽车转型，但转型进程并不顺利。

Compact crossovers like the Ford Escape and mid-size SUVs like the Ford Edge have both been discontinued, and Ford has no replacement models planned until at least 2027, when the company plans to launch a new low-cost electric vehicle platform. 像紧凑型跨界车福特翼虎（Escape）和中型 SUV 福特锐界（Edge）均已停产，且至少在 2027 年之前福特都没有替代车型推出，届时该公司才计划推出一款新的低成本电动汽车平台。

item.title: 零跑年会被吐槽拉跨：自备干粮
item.guid: 零跑年会被吐槽拉跨：自备干粮
item.description:
According to Bianews, recently, after Leapmotor's 2026 annual meeting concluded, many employees complained, saying that the annual meeting was "ridiculously bad." 据鞭牛士报道，近日，零跑汽车 2026 年年会结束后，不少员工爆料吐槽，称这场年会简直「拉垮到离谱」。

According to employee revelations, the annual meeting was so absurd that lunch was not provided, and HR advised everyone to bring their own dry food. Halfway through the event, people were so hungry they were looking for snacks and eating bread to fill their stomachs. 据员工爆料，年会离谱到中午不管饭，HR 建议大家自备干粮，活动开到一半饿得找零食、啃面包垫肚子。

Besides the lack of food, the venue environment was even more indescribable. Not only was there no air conditioning, making it "freezing cold," but the number of restrooms was severely insufficient, and hot water supply couldn't keep up. Even worse, some organizers encountered rainy weather and had to set up temporary shelters outdoors to make do. 除了没饭吃，会场环境更是一言难尽。现场不仅没有空调「冻得要死」，而且厕所数量严重不足，热水供应也跟不上。更惨的是，部分承办方还赶上了下雨天，只能在户外临时搭棚子硬撑。

According to Sina Tech, Leapmotor's annual meeting was held in batches by department. Reports indicate that the controversial event was the Leapmotor 2026 Electronics Product Line Annual Gala. Some insiders also stated that this was the annual meeting for the parts factory, not Leapmotor's main vehicle factory. 据新浪科技报道， 零跑汽车的年会是按照部门分批召开。 有报道称，引发争议的是零跑 2026 电子产品线年会盛典。也有知情人士称，此次是零部件工厂年会，并非零跑汽车主机厂年会。

item.title: 💡 扎克伯格：AI 是社媒的未来
item.guid: 💡-扎克伯格：AI-是社媒的未来
item.description:
According to The Verge, Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg recently stated during an earnings call that artificial intelligence (AI) will be the future of social media. 据 The Verge 消息，Meta CEO 扎克伯格日前在财报电话会上表示，人工智能（AI）将会是社交媒体的未来。

Zuckerberg pointed out that AI will make social media content more immersive. "The initial form of social media was text, then it shifted to photos when phones gained camera capabilities, and then entered the video era when mobile data networks became fast enough. Soon, we will see an explosion of new media forms." 扎克伯格指出，AI 将会使得社交媒体的内容更加沉浸。「社媒的最初形态是文字，然后在手机具备摄像功能后转向照片，接着再移动数据网络足够快时进入视频时代。很快，我们将看到全新的媒体形态爆发。」

He also added that most current social media platforms use algorithms for content recommendations, but this situation will change. In the future, Meta's applications will greet customers with AI, which will be able to "understand" users and provide content they like, as well as generate excellent personalized content. 其还补充表示，目前的社媒大多使用推荐内容的算法，但这种情况将发生改变，未来 Meta 的应用将以 AI 迎接客户，这些 AI 将能够「理解」用户并提供他们喜欢的内容，还能够生成出色的个性化内容。

At the conference, Zuckerberg also mentioned that after AI is integrated into social media, users will be able to create a virtual world or game using a prompt and share it with friends. Even videos will become interactive in the future. 会上，扎克伯格还提到到，AI 接入社媒后，用户将能够通过一段提示词（prompt）来创造一个虚拟世界或游戏，并且能与好友分享，甚至连视频在未来也将成为可以互动的形式。

It's worth noting that Google recently officially launched its world model Genie 3, allowing users to generate real-time interactive content that can be played with, simply by providing a prompt and an image. 值得一提的是，Google 近期正式推出了世界模型 Genie 3，用户只需要简单的提示词以及一张图片，便可以生成能够互动游玩的实时交互内容。

item.title: 苹果正考虑方形折叠屏手机
item.guid: 苹果正考虑方形折叠屏手机
item.description:
Online rumors of iPhone Fold (first foldable screen) design

According to Bloomberg reporter Mark Gurman, Apple's internal labs are considering creating a square, clamshell-style foldable screen product. 据彭博社记者 Mark Gurman 消息， 苹果实验室内部正在考虑打造一款方形的翻盖式折叠屏产品。

Gurman did not reveal more information in the report, but he hinted that the square foldable phone might be similar to vertical small foldable products from Moto, Samsung, and others. Gurman 并未在报道中透露更多信息，但其暗示，该方形折叠手机或与 moto、三星等竖向小折叠产品类似。

At the same time, he also pointed out that it is still uncertain whether the product will actually be launched. But Apple is betting that its first foldable iPhone will be successful enough to create real demand for the category, and that customers will want more choices in shapes and sizes. 同时其也指出，产品能否真正上市仍不确定。但苹果正押注其首款可折叠 iPhone 将足够成功，从而为该类别产生实际需求，并且顾客将希望拥有更多形状和尺寸的选择。

It is reported that Apple will launch its first foldable screen phone product this year, with an expected external screen size of 5.5 inches. According to multiple sources, this foldable screen is expected to eliminate the long-standing "crease problem," and the internal screen when unfolded will have a similar aspect ratio to the iPad. 据悉，苹果将会在今年推出首款折叠屏手机产品，预计外屏尺寸为 5.5 英寸，并据多方信息显示，该款折叠屏预计将会消灭存在已久的「折痕问题」，展开后的内屏将与 iPad 的屏幕比例类似。

Gurman also revealed that Apple is currently planning to simultaneously launch M5 Pro/Max versions of the MacBook Pro when macOS 26.3 is released. 同时 Gurman 还透露，苹果目前正计划在 macOS 26.3 发布时，同步推出 M5 Pro/Max 版本的 MacBook Pro。

Gurman pointed out that several models of the M4 Pro/Max MacBook Pro currently on sale have already sold out, and the shipping time for some models has been delayed until February-March. Gurman 指出，目前在售的 M4 Pro/Max MacBook Pro 已有多款型号售罄，并且部分型号发货时间已经延迟至 2-3 月。

According to reports, the M5 Pro/Max MacBook Pro will retain its current appearance, with only the processor being upgraded. Codenamed J714 and J716, they are expected to be launched between February and March. 据报道，M5 Pro/Max 的 MacBook Pro 将保持现款外观，仅对处理器进行升级，代号分别为 J714 和 J716，预计 2-3 月期间推出。

Additionally, Gurman also pointed out that the M5 version of the MacBook Air is also coming soon. 另外，Gurman 还指出，M5 版 MacBook Air 也即将推出。

item.title: 三星 S26 渲染图曝光
item.guid: 三星-S26-渲染图曝光
item.description:
According to Android Headlines, the Samsung Galaxy S26 series, scheduled for release on February 25th, recently had its appearance renders exposed. 据 Android Headlines 报道，计划 2 月 25 日发布的三星 Galaxy S26 系列，近期外观渲染图遭到曝光。

From the leaked images, the overall design of the S26 is not significantly different from the S25, also adopting a dual-sided flat panel + flat-edged frame design. The rear camera module uses a dual-layer design similar to the Z Fold 7 and maintains a triple-camera setup. 从曝光的图片来看，S26 整机设计与 S25 相差不大，同样采用双面直板+直边中框的设计。后置镜头模组采用类似 Z Fold 7 的双层设计，并且保持三摄组合。

According to reports, the S26 will feature a 6.3-inch 1080P screen, a 4300mAh battery, with the European version expected to use Exynos 2600 (the Chinese version is expected to use Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5); the camera configuration remains consistent with the previous generation, still featuring a 50MP main camera + 12MP ultra-wide + 10MP telephoto. 据报道称，S26 将采用 6.3 英寸 1080P 屏幕，电池容量为 4300mAh，欧版预计采用 Exynos 2600（国行预计为高通骁龙 8 Elite Gen 5）；镜头配置与上代保持一致，依然为 50MP 主摄 + 12MP 超广角 + 10MP 长焦。

The S26+ will have an increased battery (4900mAh) and screen size (6.7 inches 2K). S26+ 则增大电池（4900mAh）和屏幕尺寸（6.7 英寸 2K）。

item.title: 小米类 CallKit 能力上线
item.guid: 小米类-CallKit-能力上线
item.description:
Recently, Xiaomi HyperOS officially launched the "VoIP Service Kit" (call service) interface introduction in its official development documentation. 日前，小米 HyperOS 在官方的开发文档中，正式上线了「VoIP Service Kit」（通话服务）接口介绍。

It is reported that the VoIP Service Kit (call service) is a call management service provided by Xiaomi for IM applications. Such applications can easily implement functions such as one-click answer for incoming calls, banner notifications, mute and unmute, by integrating the VoIP Service Kit, thereby enhancing user experience. 据悉，VoIP Service Kit（通话服务）是小米提供给 IM 类应用的通话管理服务。该类应用可通过集成 VoIP Service Kit，轻松实现来电一键接听、横幅通知、静音与取消静音等功能，提升用户体验。

According to the documentation, VoIP Service Kit scenarios are divided into two categories: incoming call scenarios and outgoing call scenarios. 从文档来看，VoIP Service Kit 场景分为来电场景、去电场景两类。

In an incoming call scenario, the application needs to report incoming call information to the VoIP Service Kit, and the system will display an incoming call banner notification to the user. Users can perform actions such as answering or rejecting calls, muting and unmuting, and hanging up calls on the banner. 其中来电场景下，应用需要将来电信息上报给 VoIP Service Kit，系统会为用户展示来电横幅通知。用户可以在横幅上执行接听或拒接来电、静音与解除静音、挂断通话等操作。

It is worth mentioning that this service will be implemented by integrating with Xiaomi MiPush. 值得一提的是， 该服务将通过接入小米 MiPush 实现。

It is understood that the VoIP Service Kit provided by Xiaomi this time is similar to Apple's CallKit and HarmonyOS's Call Service Kit, both enabling third-party apps to access system-level incoming and outgoing call interfaces. 据了解，小米本次提供的 VoIP Service Kit 与苹果的 CallKit、鸿蒙的 Call Service Kit 相似，都能实现第三方 App 接入系统级来电、去电界面。

item.title: 喜茶将在广州沙面开设 DP 店
item.guid: 喜茶将在广州沙面开设-DP-店
item.description:
Recently, Heytea announced that it will open a DP store in Shamian, Guangzhou, and simultaneously launch a "Taste Tea First" event. 日前，喜茶宣布将在广州沙面开设 DP 门店，并同步开启「抢先叹茶」活动。

It is reported that the store will launch several limited products: "Old Canton Fresh Tofu Skin Soy Milk Ice Cream," "Old Canton Fresh Tofu Skin Soy Milk," and "Salted Cheese Yinghong Ice Cream." The store will also launch limited edition refrigerator magnets and canvas bags. 据悉，门店将会推出多款限定产品：「老广鲜腐竹豆浆冰淇淋」「老广鲜腐竹豆浆」「咸酪英红冰淇淋」。同时门店还将推出限定冰箱贴和帆布袋。

The store will officially open on February 6. 门店将于 2 月 6 日正式开业。

item.title: 三亚机场 T3 航站楼启动试运行
item.guid: 三亚机场-T3-航站楼启动试运行
item.description:
According to Sanya Phoenix International Airport, on February 1, 2026, with passengers of flight HU7349 successfully completing check-in, security checks, and other full-process boarding procedures at Terminal 3 of Sanya Phoenix International Airport (referred to as "Sanya Airport") under Hainan Holdings, and flying to Chongqing, it marks the official trial operation of Sanya Airport's Terminal 3 starting today. 据三亚凤凰国际机场消息，2026 年 2 月 1 日，随着 HU7349 航班的旅客在海南控股旗下三亚凤凰国际机场（简称「三亚机场」）T3 航站楼顺利完成值机、安检等全流程乘机手续，飞往重庆，标志着三亚机场 T3 航站楼即日起启动试运行。

According to reports, as a landmark expansion project during Hainan Civil Aviation's "14th Five-Year Plan" period and an important pilot project for the construction of the Hainan Free Trade Port airport cluster, Terminal 3 adopts a linear layout and mixed flow mode for arrivals and departures, fully undertaking domestic flight support functions. 据介绍，作为海南民航「十四五」时期的标志性扩容工程和海南自贸港机场群建设的重要先导性项目，T3 航站楼采用前列式布局与进出港混流模式，全面承载国内航班保障功能。

Terminal 3 is equipped with 40 check-in counters, 23 security channels, and 7 boarding bridges (fixed ends). Additionally, it connects with Terminals 1 and 2 via a corridor, achieving integrated operation across all three terminals. T3 航站楼设有值机柜台 40 个、安检通道 23 条、登机廊桥 7 座 (固定端)，另外通过连廊与 T1、T2 航站楼衔接，实现三楼联动、一体化运行。

It is reported that after the project is put into use, the total area of Sanya Airport's terminal buildings will increase to 228,000 square meters, further enhancing the airport's comprehensive operational support capabilities, optimizing the passenger travel experience, and improving service quality. 据悉，该项目投用后，三亚机场航站楼总面积将增至 22.8 万平方米，进一步提升机场综合运行保障实力、优化旅客出行体验、提升服务品质。

item.title: 微软或将《我的世界》引入 Steam
item.guid: 微软或将《我的世界》引入-Steam
item.description:
According to NoteBook Check, despite Microsoft's full shift towards PC gaming in recent years, the popular IP "Minecraft" has still not been added to the Steam game library. 据 NoteBook Check 报道，尽管近些年来微软正全面转向 PC 游戏，但热门 IP《我的世界》依然没能加入 Steam 游戏库。

And according to reports citing Windows Central editor Jez Corden, Microsoft will bring more Xbox Game Studios first-party games to the Steam platform in the coming months. 而据报道援引 Windows Central 编辑 Jez Corden 消息称，微软未来几个月会将更多 Xbox 工作室第一方游戏带入 Steam 平台。

Some media also stated that Microsoft could easily bring games like "Minecraft," "Crackdown 3," and "Fable 3" to Steam, but some older games might first require the removal of Windows Live. 也有媒体表示，微软可以轻松将《我的世界》《除暴战警 3》《神鬼寓言 3》等游戏带入 Steam，但部分旧游戏很可能需要先删除掉 Windows Live。

However, the mainstream view currently holds that the main reason "Minecraft" has not landed on the Steam platform is revenue sharing issues. 但目前主流观点认为，《我的世界》未登陆 Steam 平台的主要原因是收入分成问题。

item.title: 剧版《哈利波特》预计明年开播
item.guid: 剧版《哈利波特》预计明年开播
item.description:
According to The Hollywood Reporter, citing "Deadline," the TV series adaptation of "Harry Potter" will premiere in early 2027. 据守望好莱坞援引「Deadline」报道，剧版《哈利·波特》将于 2027 年初开播。

HBO content president Casey Bloys revealed: "We've been saying 2027 (for the premiere), and now I'm narrowing it down to some extent: early 2027. So you'll ask: Is that January, February, March, or April? We're not ready to announce that yet. (In short) I would say early 2027." HBO 内容部总裁 Casey Bloys 透露：「我们一直在说 2027 年 (开播)，现在我在一定程度上缩小范围：2027 年早期。那么你会要问：那是 1 月、2 月、3 月还是 4 月？这个我们现在还没准备好公布。(总之) 我会说 2027 年初。」

It is reported that the TV series adaptation of "Harry Potter" began filming plans last summer. HBO states that this will be a faithful adaptation of the original work, with J.K. Rowling involved in its development. 据悉，剧版《哈利波特》已于去年夏天开始拍摄计划。HBO 称这将是一部对原著的忠实改编，J·K·罗琳参与开发。

item.title: 披头士传记剧照曝光
item.guid: 披头士传记剧照曝光
item.description:
Recently, the musical biopic series "The Beatles," directed by Sam Mendes, officially unveiled character stills of the four band members: 日前，由萨姆·门德斯执导的音乐传记电影《The Beatles》（系列）正式曝光四位乐队成员剧照：

    Paul Mescal as Paul McCartney

    Barry Keoghan as Ringo Starr

    Joseph Quinn as George Harrison

    Harris Dickinson as John Lennon

It is reported that the series will consist of four films, with each of the four band members starring in one film, intertwining to tell "the story of the greatest band in history" from each member's perspective. All films are scheduled to be released in North America in April 2028. 据悉，该系列电影计划有四部，乐队四人每人各担任其中一部电影的主角，从每个成员的视角相互交织讲述「历史上最伟大的乐队的故事」，全部电影都将在 2028 年 4 月北美上映。

item.title: 《速度与激情 11》定档 2028 年
item.guid: 《速度与激情-11》定档-2028-年
item.description:
According to Sina Film, "Fast & Furious 11" is scheduled for release in North America on March 17, 2028, with the title "Fast Forever." 据新浪电影报道，《速度与激情 11》定档 2028 年 3 月 17 日北美上映，片名定为「Fast Forever」。

Star Vin Diesel posted on Instagram to celebrate the film's release date (finally set after his public request to Universal), sharing a photo with the late actor Paul Walker and stating: "Nobody said it would be easy along the way, but this is our path, this path defines us, and it will become our legacy, a legacy that will be forever." 主演范·迪塞尔发 Ins 庆祝该片（在他公开请求环球后终于）定档，他分享与已故的该片演员保罗·沃克合影，表示：「没人说一路上会很轻松，但这是我们的路，这条路定义了我们，且将成为我们的传承，这份传承，将是永远。」

Previously, Diesel had stated that Brian, played by Walker, would be in "Fast & Furious 11", saying he had made three conditions to Universal for the film: "First, bring the series back to Los Angeles; second, return to car culture and street racing; third, reunite Dom and Brian." He also mentioned that Universal hopes the film will be the conclusion to the "Fast & Furious" series. 此前，迪塞尔曾表示《速激 11》里会有沃克饰演的 Brian，表示自己就该片向环球提了三个条件：「一、把系列带回洛杉矶，二、回归汽车文化和街头赛车，三、让 Don 跟 Brian 重聚。」他也提到环球希望该片是「速激」系列的结局。
